title: English Word Records
description: From the shortest to the most versatile, English words hold some fascinating records. How many of these word record-holders do you know?

questions.question: Which single letter is considered a complete word in English and is also the shortest sentence ('I')?
Which word has the most definitions in the Oxford English Dictionary?
What is the most commonly used word in written English?
Which is the most commonly used letter in English?
What is the least commonly used letter in English?
Which word holds the record for the most consecutive vowels in common English?
What is the only common English word that ends in '-mt'?
Which English word has the most homonyms (words spelled differently but sounding the same)?
What is the longest English word that uses only one vowel (repeated)?
Which word holds the record for the most meanings as both a noun and a verb?
What is the shortest word in English that contains all five vowels?
The word 'set' has approximately how many distinct definitions in the Oxford English Dictionary?
Which is the longest common English word with all letters in reverse alphabetical order?
What is the most commonly misspelled word in English, according to various studies?
Which English word can be pronounced in two different ways to mean two different things, and has the most common usage?
